sense.def:
The staff of an organization
so ljudje, ki delajo v neki organizaciji.

seg.quote: She was invited to join the staff of the BBC.
There are two students to every member of staff.
They have already agreed to cut their staffs.

sense.def:
Kadar je neka organizacija
staffed by particular people
, določene osebe delajo zanjo.

seg.quote: It was staffed and run by engineers.
